front.title: Stateless Automatic IPv4 over IPv6 Encapsulation / Decapsulation Technology with IPv4 Address Sharing

abstract.t: This document specifies Stateless Automatic IPv4 over IPv6 Encapsulation / Decapsulation Technology with IPv4 Address Sharing (SA46T-AS) base specification. SA46T-AS is basically the same technology with SA46T, however that have IPv4 address sharing capability. SA46T-SA is gateway technology, not protocol.
